page.title: 18ST.GEORGES PRIVATE SCHOOL
page.content: There are 285 pupils at St.Georges. Boys attend the school at Gt Finborough Hall from the ages of 7-17. There are female teachers as well as male teachers at the school. Alot of the boys have parents in the forces abroad and they have a combined cadet force. The boys work from 9am-5pm.They have much the same lessons as state schools. After school they do prep for about 1 hour. They have very good sports facilities for football, rugby, hockey, tennis, swimming, athletics and canoeing. Gt Finborough Hall has 180 acres of land, 120 of which are rented to the golf course. The first owner of the Hall was Roger de Oberville, since then the Digby, Wollaston and Pettiward families have owned it. Since 1980 the owners have been St.Georges school.
